name: subtractive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
mathematics
  specialized relating to subtraction (= the process of removing one number from another): The subtractive equation property states that the two sides of an equation remain equal if the same number is subtracted from each side.
formal involving taking something away: Milling machines carve parts in a subtractive process from a blank. Medicine is subtractive in that you need to subtract out anything that is irrelevant until you can isolate the one thing left that works.
formal getting less by being combined, or getting less over time: Interference is a phenomenon in which two waves either have an additive or subtractive effect on each other's intensity.
